text.section: Subject to the provisions of § 1-701 of this subtitle, a judge shall have the salary provided in the State budget.

The Chief Judge of the District Court, during the period he serves as Chief Judge, shall have a salary equivalent to the annual salary then payable to an associate judge of the Court of Special Appeals.
